short_summary: The tender will procure construction services to replace five (5) existing Air Handling Units at their laboratory in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia.
description: The work will include replacing five (5) existing Air Handling Units, the Computer Room Air Conditioning unit, VAV terminal units, and associated control/electrical components in the Admin area, as well as upgrading the Penthouse and Interstitial Level Ventilation. The work shall be completed within 88 weeks of the Award Notification, and the estimated cost of this procurement is between $5,000,000 and $20,000,000.00.
full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify: ITT - Air Handling Unit Upgrades

#### Solicitation Number
WS3620759587

#### Amendment Number
3

#### Publication Date
August 16, 2022

#### Tender Closing Date
October 13, 2022, 2:00 PM (ADT)

#### Amendment Date
October 14, 2022

#### Expected Contract Start Date
September 14, 2022

#### Expected Contract End Date
January 31, 2024

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Trade Agreements
The Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

#### Objective
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites contractors to qualifty for the replacement of five (5) existing Air Handling Units at their laboratory in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia. The work also includes the replacement of the Computer Room Air Conditioning unit, VAV terminal units, and associated control/electrical components in the Admin area.

#### Scope of Work
The work involves replacing five (5) Air Handling Units, the Computer Room Air Conditioning unit, VAV terminal units, and associated control/electrical components in the Admin area. The Penthouse and Interstitial Level Ventilation is also being upgraded.

#### Evaluation Criteria
**Technical Capacity**: The contractor must perform and complete the work within 88 weeks of award notification.

**Financial Evaluation**: The estimated cost of this procurement is between $5,000,000 and $20,000,000.00.
